trans-unit.source: Retrieves information about the specified module

target.mrk: Retrieves information about the specified module

trans-unit.source: Handle to the process that contains the module. The handle must have the $PROCESS_QUERY_INFORMATION or

The handle must have the $PROCESS_QUERY_INFORMATION or

target.mrk: Handle to the process that contains the module.
The handle must have the $PROCESS_QUERY_INFORMATION or

trans-unit.source: $PROCESS_QUERY_LIMITED_INFORMATION access right and the $PROCESS_VM_READ access right.

trans-unit.source: [optional] Handle to the module. If this parameter is 0, the function retrieves information only about the

seg-source.mrk: If this parameter is 0, the function retrieves information only about the

target.mrk: If this parameter is 0, the function retrieves information only about the

trans-unit.source: executable file ("SizeOfImage" and "EntryPoint" members of the $tagMODULEINFO structure).

seg-source.mrk: executable file ("SizeOfImage" and "EntryPoint" members of the $tagMODULEINFO structure).

target.mrk: executable file ("SizeOfImage" and "EntryPoint" members of the $tagMODULEINFO structure).

trans-unit.source: $tagMODULEINFO structure that contains information about the module.

trans-unit.source: Sets the @error flag to non-zero, call _WinAPI_GetLastError() to get extended error information.

seg-source.mrk: Sets the @error flag to non-zero, call _WinAPI_GetLastError() to get extended error information.

target.mrk: Sets the @error flag to non-zero, call _WinAPI_GetLastError() to get extended error information.

trans-unit.source: This function does not retrieve information for modules that were loaded with the $LOAD_LIBRARY_AS_DATAFILE flag.

seg-source.mrk: This function does not retrieve information for modules that were loaded with the $LOAD_LIBRARY_AS_DATAFILE flag.

target.mrk: This function does not retrieve information for modules that were loaded with the $LOAD_LIBRARY_AS_DATAFILE flag.
